metadata.name: HackTool - Certify Execution
metadata.comment: Detects Certify a tool for Active Directory certificate abuse based on PE metadata characteristics and common command line arguments.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\certify.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('certify.exe') AND contains(lower(device.desc), lower('certify')) OR (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe cas ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe find ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe pkiobjects ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe request ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe download '))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /vulnerable')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /template:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /altname:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /domain:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /path:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /ca:')))))

output.summary: Detects Certify a tool for Active Directory certificate abuse based on PE metadata characteristics and common command line arguments.
